title: OLC-WA: Drift Aware Tuning-Free Online Classification with Weighted Average
summary: Real-world data sets often exhibit temporal dynamics characterized by evolving data distributions. Disregarding this phenomenon, commonly referred to as concept drift, can significantly diminish a model's predictive accuracy.
